content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is operational and has space for the items before inserting. Check the furnace's inventory status.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has items available. Attempting to extract from an empty furnace will lead to errors. 

### General Inventory Management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have enough resources for your operations.
